page.title: 19NEWS FROM CATERHAM 28 6 85
page.content:
A new{POLICE STATION}is planned. It will replace the 60 year old building in Timberhill Road. Many alterations have been made in past years, but police Chief Constable Hayes says, "The present conditions are totally unsuitable." So{CATERHAM}may have a new police station at last!
{TEACHERS STRIKE ACTION}will be taken by members of the{NATIONAL UNION OF {TEACHERS}in support of their pay claim. Next week forty schools will be hit in{SOUTH EAST SURREY.}More than 300 teachers will be on strike on Wednesday causing disruption to schools in Redhill, Reigate, Caterham, Oxted and Horley.
